title.rendered: MGM RESORTS DONATES $25,000 TO SUPPORT LGBTQ+ ENTREPRENEURSHIP

content.rendered:
LAS VEGAS, June 29, 2023 /PRNewswire/ — MGM Resorts International (NYSE: MGM) (“MGM Resorts” or the “Company”) reaffirmed its commitment to supporting LGBTQ+ entrepreneurship businesses with a $25,000 donation to the Nevada Gay and Lesbian Chamber of Commerce (GLCCNV). The donation was presented in a special ceremony during a Pride Month event held at MGM Grand’s Level Up.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/mgm-resorts-donates-25-000-to-support-lgbtq-entrepreneurship-301867050.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com

The donation was presented in a special ceremony during a Pride Month event held at MGM Grand’s […]
